channel.title: Deep learning on KAILI ZHAO
channel.description: Recent content in Deep learning on KAILI ZHAO

item.title: Deep Region Learning for Facial Expression Recognition.
item.description:
Face detection, tracking, and expression recognition. We train SSD as a single-shot face detector, use data assosiation as face tracker, and exploit Deep Region Learning [1] as expression clssifier. Specifically, in Deep Region Learning, we include soft-max loss to replace multi-label loss in [1], and keep using deep region learning module for updating feature maps by each local region whiletraining binary epression classifier. In addition, we inlcude WIDER-FACE dataset [2] and RAF expression dataset [3] for tranining.

[1] Kaili Zhao, Wen-Sheng Chu, Honggang Zhang, “Deep Region and Multi-label Learning for Facial Action Unit Detection”. CVPR 2016.
[2] Yang, Shuo, et al. “Wider face: A face detection benchmark.” Proceedings of the IEEE conference on computer vision and pattern recognition. 2016.
[3] Shan Li, Weihong Deng, JunPing DU, “Reliable Crowdsourcing and Deep Locality-Preserving Learning for Expression Recognition in the Wild”, CVPR 2017.
